name: Death Rock
description:
Break through platforms and obstacles as you race to escape the Sun!  How deep can you go?

This game was made for the LOWREZGAMEJAM, and features an in-game resolution of 64x64! The theme was "The Sun is your enemy". If you have any feedback or run into any issues, please post below!
